```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(learnr)
library(r2dii.banks)

tutorial_options(
  exercise.timelimit = 60,
  exercise.eval=TRUE
)

# Problematic arguments: collapse, error, message, warning, comment
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE, 
  # Can't be set in tutorial_options()
  exercise = TRUE,  
  # Problematic arguments: Cause odd code wrapping errors
  collapse = FALSE, 
  error = FALSE, 
  warning = FALSE, 
  message = FALSE
)
```
